19#include <sys/types.h>
20
21#include "tmux.h"
22
23/*
24 * Refresh client.
25 */
26
27static enum cmd_retval cmd_refresh_client_exec(struct cmd *,
28 struct cmdq_item *);
29
30const struct cmd_entry cmd_refresh_client_entry = {
31 .name = "refresh-client",
32 .alias = "refresh",
33
34 .args = { "C:St:", 0, 0 },
35 .usage = "[-S] [-C size] " CMD_TARGET_CLIENT_USAGE,
36
37 .flags = CMD_AFTERHOOK,
38 .exec = cmd_refresh_client_exec
39};
40
41static enum cmd_retval
42cmd_refresh_client_exec(struct cmd *self, struct cmdq_item *item)
43{
44 struct args *args = self->args;
45 struct client *c;
46 const char *size;
47 u_int w, h;
48
49 if ((c = cmd_find_client(item, args_get(args, 't'), 0)) == NULL)
50 return (CMD_RETURN_ERROR);
51
52 if (args_has(args, 'C')) {
53 if ((size = args_get(args, 'C')) == NULL) {
54 cmdq_error(item, "missing size");
55 return (CMD_RETURN_ERROR);
56 }
57 if (sscanf(size, "%u,%u", &w, &h) != 2) {
58 cmdq_error(item, "bad size argument");
59 return (CMD_RETURN_ERROR);
60 }
61 if (w < PANE_MINIMUM || w > 5000 ||
62 h < PANE_MINIMUM || h > 5000) {
63 cmdq_error(item, "size too small or too big");
64 return (CMD_RETURN_ERROR);
65 }
66 if (!(c->flags & CLIENT_CONTROL)) {
67 cmdq_error(item, "not a control client");
68 return (CMD_RETURN_ERROR);
69 }
70 tty_set_size(&c->tty, w, h);
71 c->flags |= CLIENT_SIZECHANGED;
72 recalculate_sizes();
73 } else if (args_has(args, 'S')) {
74 c->flags |= CLIENT_STATUSFORCE;
75 server_status_client(c);
76 } else {
77 c->flags |= CLIENT_STATUSFORCE;
78 server_redraw_client(c);
79 }
80
81 return (CMD_RETURN_NORMAL);
82}
83
